name: Talented Healer, Kaori
text: 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I love you. That's why I want to stay with you.

name: Tremendous Power, Yue
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets +3500 power, and this card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "The Golden Vampire Princess" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card or the character facing this card is canceled, you may deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Adorable Maids, Yue & Myu & Kaori
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if all of your characters are 《Tortus》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Tortus》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Summer Beach, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 other character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Right!

name: Composure of a Wife, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may return this card to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, if "Aftertaste of a Kiss" is in your climax area, and your memory has "Special Lover, Yue", choose up to 2 《Tortus》 characters in your waiting room, put them into your stock in any order, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'll be by your side until the end. As long as I can do that, I'll have no regrets.

name: Reason for Falling in Love, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, reveal the top card of your deck. If this card's battle opponent is level X or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText:
When I first laid my eyes on Hajime-kun,
he was in front of a grandmother and a little boy...

name: Peaceful Morning, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Tortus》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: So both of you get dressed!

name: Swimsuit Yue
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "Swimsuit Yue".
flavorText: Remia you have guts.

name: Coaxing, Yue
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Tortus》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Hajime, I want a baby.

name: Newfound Power, Kaori
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by "Fusion", if you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul."
flavorText: I might look a little different but I'm very much alive!

name: Late Night Visitation, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Tortus》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Tortus》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Hajime: "Well then, would you protect me?"

name: The Girl Who Can't Die, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Tortus》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your stage into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText:
I am Yue. I can't turn pain into pleasure…
But I'm a woman that cannot die,
no matter what you do to me.

name: Spirit Magic, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Kaori will be fine.

name: God's Apostle, Noint
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Tortus》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Fusion [Put 1 "Talented Healer, Kaori" from your stage face up underneath this card as a marker] Search your deck for up to 1 "Newfound Power, Kaori", put it in the stage position that this card is on, put all markers from underneath this card and this card face up underneath that "Newfound Power, Kaori" as a marker in any order, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Such a light attack now? Have you exhausted all your options?

name: Battle Practice, Yue
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, you may choose 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText:
I am Yue… The woman who will not go easy on
training a pushy, worthless rabbit like her.

name: Gravitic Magic
text: 【COUNTER】 This card cannot be played from your hand if you do not have a character with "Yue(ユエ)" in its card name. This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. Perform the following action 2 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room."

name: The Golden Vampire Princess
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Aftertaste of a Kiss
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: It was delicious.

name: Endearing Girl, Myu
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Tortus》 character, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: No! You're my Papa, Papa!

name: Full Power, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "I'm Just a Girl With Bunny Ears!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If the character chosen is level 3 or higher, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: This is it for you!

name: Towards the New World, Tio
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: My horizons were expanded on that day!

name: Butt Up! Rabbit Time! Shea
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 character in your waiting room with the same card name as the character returned to your hand, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hya-hha!

name: Body Strengthening, Shea
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: 【Guardian】 Tio
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "True Form of the Black Dragon" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand." 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Tortus》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I feel the love Master harbors for me!

name: Pain Conversion, Tio
text: 【CONT】 If your clock has 3 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 "Kicking Away a Dragon's Rear" or 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: This pain is nothing, or rather, it feels good!

name: To Be Acknowledged, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all characters in your opponent's center stage get -2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.
flavorText: Oh, I got it! You promised, Hajime-san!

name: Reward Date, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level X or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. X is equal to the number of "Reward Date, Shea" in your waiting room.
flavorText: Yes! Oh, Hajime-san!

name: Swimsuit Tio
text: 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Doing it in public, that's nice!

name: Swimsuit Myu
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Graceful Beauty, Remia", this card gets +6000 power.
flavorText: Yes, we're going to play tag today!

name: Graceful Beauty, Remia
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Thank you, Hajime-san.

name: Conquering Grand Gruen Volcano, Tio
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Tortus》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, you may choose 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Full of Curiosity, Myu
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Papa, do you understand because this part of you grew up?

name: Big Pervert, Tio
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Tortus》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "New Sensation" is in your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Tortus》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your stock in any order, put the rest into your waiting room, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Why are you only admonishing me?!

name: Practicing Magic, Myu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may choose 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your characters are 《Tortus》, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Soy, soy, soy!

name: Promise With the Haulia Tribe, Hajime
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: You hear that? I'm heading for the other labyrinths.

name: 【Synergist】 Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 other character from your stage into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 event or climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Okay, all done. This one's named Schlagen.

name: Conquering the Great Reisen Labyrinth, Hajime
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Conquering the Great Reisen Labyrinth, Shea" get +X power and 《Drucken》. X is equal to your level ×1000. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: You're tough. We'll vouch for that.

name: Conquering the Great Reisen Labyrinth, Shea
flavorText: Peace!

name: 【Astrologist】 Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it at the bottom of your opponent's deck, and put the rest on top of your opponent's deck in any order.

name: Swimsuit Shea
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] All of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Whaaaaaa!?

name: Conquering the Great Orcus Labyrinth, Hajime
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your 《Tortus》 characters ×1000.

name: Kicking Away a Dragon's Rear
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your characters with "Tio(ティオ)" in its card name, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When the damage you received is not canceled, put up to 2 cards from the top of your clock into your waiting room."
flavorText: Hajime: "So, you're a dragonborn?"

name: I'm Just a Girl With Bunny Ears!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Take this!

name: True Form of the Black Dragon
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Never have I experienced this.

name: New Sensation
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: My heart, body, and soul fill with such pleasure!

name: Unwavering Beliefs, Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If you don't feel like dying, then get the hell outta here.

name: Together Always, Yue
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Tortus》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Unwavering Beliefs, Hajime" in your waiting room face up underneath this card as a marker] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Good!

name: Intelligent Side, Tio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Tortus》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: So rough!

name: Artifact, Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 event from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Did that thing just roar at me?

name: Personal Story, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 1 "One Who Crawled Out From the Abyss, Hajime" in your hand] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText:
Hajime: "Which means you
must be over 3-- years old."

name: Place of Belonging Found, Yue
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "One Who Crawled Out From the Abyss, Hajime" in your hand] When "Proposal?" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Tortus》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at the top card of your deck, choose up to 1 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: From this day on, I'm Yue...

name: Irregular, Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Final Battle at the Divine Mountain" from your climax area into your waiting room] During your climax phase, when this card is placed on the stage by the effect of "Final Battle at the Divine Mountain", you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Blow up!

name: One Who Crawled Out From the Abyss, Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "The Best at Being the Worst" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the level of the card put into your waiting room by this ability's cost +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I don't show mercy. I always kill.

name: Commonplace Job, Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put this card into your memory] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Ingested Power, Hajime" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in as the defending character. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Tortus》 character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 that character.
flavorText: (Sigh)

name: Record of the Labyrinth, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When your opponent's card is put into their memory, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hajime, look.

name: Girl Who Was Sealed Away, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may choose 1 of your other characters with "Hajime(ハジメ)" in its card name, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Azure Blaze!

name: Nice Shot, Hajime
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their memory. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Yue: "Nice shot."

name: Prepared to Intercept, Tio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.

name: Ingested Power, Hajime
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Guess eating him won't make my level go up any higher.

name: Conquest Achieved, Yue
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Tortus》 characters in front of this card get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax with with in its trigger icon, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Hajime, look.

name: Covered in Monster Skin, Yue
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck."
flavorText: Hajime, you perv.

name: Deadly Battle in the Deep, Hajime
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Deadly Battle in the Deep, Hajime" and "Deadly Battle in the Deep, Yue" get +2000 power.
flavorText: Transmute!

name: Deadly Battle in the Deep, Yue
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Deadly Battle in the Deep, Hajime" and "Deadly Battle in the Deep, Yue" get +2000 power.
flavorText: Please hit!

name: Yue Providing Care
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.

name: Being Ignored Like This..., Tio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Tortus》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your other 《Tortus》 characters ×1000. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 2 characters from your stage into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Enjoying the Taste, Tio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." "You may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room."
flavorText: I can't help it. Master still won't kiss me.

name: Ring From the Treasury
text: If you have 3 or more 《Tortus》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1500 power until end of turn." "Reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card." (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Proposal?
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Final Battle at the Divine Mountain
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Damn.

name: The Best at Being the Worst
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Resolve to Battle, Shizuku
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is in your center stage, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your other 《Tortus》 characters ×1000. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Bequeathed Sword" is in your climax area, and all of your characters are 《Tortus》, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your opponent's characters and 1 trait of that character, and that character loses all of that trait until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm gonna cut through them!

name: Protective Teacher, Aiko
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Classmate》 or 《Teacher》 characters, you cannot receive 1 or less damage by the 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Of course, as a teacher, my students always come first.

name: A Wholesome Meeting, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Once in a Lifetime Request" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of your opponent's deck in any order, put the rest into their waiting room, at the end of this card's attack, if this card is in the stage, reveal the top card of your deck, and put it at the bottom of your deck. If that card has in its trigger icon, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Hajime-san, please take me with you on your journey!

name: Love Rivals, Kaori & Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Tortus》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
Kaori: "I definitely showed him a miserable side of me."
Yue: "You should have just given up."

name: Conquering the Sunken Ruins of Melusine, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Duties of a Priest" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total number of in the trigger icons of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Sexy Bikini, Yue ＆ Shea
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card at the bottom of your deck] Search your deck for up to 1 《Tortus》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
Yue: "I'll get distracted if you're there."
Shea: "Distracted? What are you going to do?!"

name: Emotions Welling Up, Aiko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Summer Beach, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your 《Tortus》 characters ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Tortus》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Can I ask for gentler treatment...?

name: 【Priest】 Kaori
text: 【CONT】 Experience If you have 2 or more "Unwavering Beliefs, Hajime" or "Protective Teacher, Aiko" in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Tortus》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Benevolence" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Now I'm going to try to become someone special. No matter what anyone says.

name: 【Swordsman】 Shizuku
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if you have 2 or more other 《Classmate》 or 《Teacher》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Sure. I'll be with you all the way.

name: 【Farmer】 Aiko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Yep, no way am I going to let that go! You're getting a lecture! You'd better change your ways!

name: Worthless Rabbit, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you do not have another character in your back stage, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character in any position of your back stage.
flavorText: Nooooooo!

name: 【Hero】 Kouki
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock]".
flavorText: We're hundreds of times stronger! We won't lose again! We're going to win this one!

name: Yaegashi-Ryu Swordsmanship, Shizuku
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Tortus》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: C'mon, you can cut open a path for us.

name: Firm Resolve, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your level and 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【ACT】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Tortus》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.
flavorText: I promised... I promised to protect him!

name: Tending the Wounded, Kaori
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
flavorText: Please keep it together...

name: Self-Practice, Shizuku
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: Just training. Gotta keep up or I'll get rusty.

name: All Over, Kaori
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Return to the Royal Palace, Shizuku" get +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Return to the Royal Palace, Shizuku", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Return to the Royal Palace, Shizuku
flavorText: Lily!

name: Swimsuit Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, perform the following action 3 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck."
flavorText: Remia-san, since when... I can't let my guard down.

name: Defending the Royal Capital, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Tortus》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your other 《Tortus》 characters ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Princess Liliana
text: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I have to let someone know...

name: For Humanity, Shizuku
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Tortus》 character, all of your characters get +5000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I'll fight, too. That's all we can do right now.

name: The Final Blow, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +4500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Goddess of Abundance, Aiko
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Classmate》 or 《Teacher》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards except that card from their waiting room to their deck, and shuffles their deck.
flavorText: Fill your bellies and get ready to work hard again tomorrow!

name: Saving a Life
text: 【COUNTER】 Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Choose 1 of your 《Tortus》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may put this card in its previous stage position as 【REST】."
flavorText: Aiko: "Mm!? Nn...Mn"

name: Bequeathed Sword
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Thanks.

name: Once in a Lifetime Request
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: W-well, uhh...

name: Duties of a Priest
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Bring cleansing and healing... Heaven's Blessing.

name: Benevolence
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: No evil shall pass so long as I hold the gates. Sanctorum!

name: Clothing Exchange Party, Yue
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +4000 power.
flavorText: Myu, you can't open so suddenly.

name: Clothing Exchange Party, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Kaori-san's outfit has so many layers, it's hard to move around in this.

name: Clothing Exchange Party, Myu
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Tortus》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Papa! Look, look!

name: Clothing Exchange Party, Tio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Tortus》 character, choose 1 of your other 《Tortus》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I've never worn anything like this before. This is a new feeling.

name: Clothing Exchange Party, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: This is too revealing...

name: Bathtime, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if there is a climax in your opponent's climax area, choose 1 of your 《Tortus》 characters in battle, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Take a good look!

name: Winning, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: How do you like this?

name: Fresh Out the Bath, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: Hajime-kun?

name: Special Lover, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Tortus》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Good work.

name: Compassionate Girl, Kaori
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Big Sister Kaori is also really good at binding enemies!

name: Strongest Duo, Yue & Hajime
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Tortus》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Conveying Sentiments" is in your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 "At the Bottom of the Abyss" or 《Tortus》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Hajime: "And we're gonna defeat everything and everyone… and surpass the entire world, together!"

name: Suggestion Half in Jest, Kaori
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Oh? So should I call you Yue-chan from now on?

name: Bad With Heat, Yue
flavorText: Wipe me down Hajime.

name: The Last Vampire, Yue
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Tortus》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Yue, the last vampire.

name: At the Bottom of the Abyss
text: 【COUNTER】 Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Tortus》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. Put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: I'm one of a long line of vampires, and extremely powerful, too...

name: Conveying Sentiments
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Hajime: "Then we're going to the surface and going home. Together."

name: Merfolk Girl, Myu
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: After all, I'm Papa's daughter.

name: Bad With Heat, Hajime
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Bad With Heat, Yue" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Bad With Heat, Yue" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Bad With Heat, Yue" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: You can go ahead and relax but don't forget to wipe off your sweat.

name: Important Friend, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Tortus》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: The future isn't absolute! Don't you know that?

name: Honorable Dragonborn, Tio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Tortus》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: I'll show you my breath attack!

name: Important Friend, Tio
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Tortus》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if there is a climax in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: To be honest, this sort of treatment is what really gets me all hot and bothered inside!

name: Wanting That Pleasure Once More, Tio
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Tortus》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, you may choose 1 《Tortus》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I deserve a reward.

name: Showing Off Her Strength, Shea
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Tortus》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Myu-chan! Aren't I cool?!

name: Brave Rabbitman, Shea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it in any position of your stage, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, if "Well Then, Let's Go!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Tortus》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.

name: Well Then, Let's Go!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: A New Journey
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Hajime: "Well, here we go."
